Post-Match Reflections: Shakib Al Hasan said his team could have done better after being eliminated from the T20 World Cup.
Bangladesh lost to Pakistan by 5 wickets at the Adelaide Oval in the Super-12 stage of the tournament.
Shakib said this was the team's best performance in the T20 World Cup but they could've done better.
Shakib mentioned that 145-5 would have been a reasonable total on the Adelaide pitch.
Shakib stated that as long as he's fit and performing, he'd love to play.
